trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `Command` event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O `Command` o evento é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: When you create a CommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado CommandEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados do processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
